name: Dark Mode for SmartMusic (v1)
description:
I've been busy on SmartMusic recently.. so here comes a dark mode for it!

It's kind of confusing to find this website for the first few times you visit this website, so here's the link: admin.smartmusic.com

Q: Why no old SmartMusic?
A: It's not on a website (unless I'm wrong, then whoops message me the link)

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
v1 - June 6th
A lot of changes, now it's finished :) If anything is missing, message me. (other than the tuner, which is a pain to make dark since it's in a weirdly formatted image)

v0 - June 1st
RELEASEEEEEE
but really rushed (in 2 days) and partially finished :/
